com.example.schultzhattervigweatherviewer

Class Forecast.LoadForecast

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.example.schultzhattervigweatherviewer.Forecast.LoadForecast
  • Enclosing class:
    Forecast

    public class Forecast.LoadForecast
extends

    Description:

    Makes the API call to grab the forecast information and the icon. The class uses .execute(zipCode) to call the async task.

    Date:
            Novemeber 11, 2012

    Extends:
            AsyncTask <String, Void, Forecast>
    String -> Parameter
    Void -> Progress
    Forecast -> Result

    Implements:
            (nothing)

    Author:
    Josh Schultz, Erik Hattervig

    • Constructor Detail

      • Forecast.LoadForecast

        public Forecast.LoadForecast(Context context,
                     IListeners listener)

        Description:

        Constructor. Sets up the listener which later will be used to notify when the async task is finished.

        Date:
                Novemeber 11, 2012

        Parameters:
        context[in] - - The activity associated with this object
        listener[in] - - The object listening for the result.

    • Method Detail

      • doInBackground

        protected Forecast doInBackground(java.lang.String... params)

        Description:

        The async portion of LoadForecast. This method makes the API call for the forecast, parses the call, and returns a Forecast object. If there is no network available, or the API call is unsuccessful, null is returned.

        Date:
                Novemeber 11, 2012

        Parameters:
        params[in] - - The zip code for the API call.
        Returns:
        Forecast - The forecast information from the API call

      • onPostExecute

        protected void onPostExecute(Forecast forecast)
        After the forecast is received, this method is automatically called to notify the listener.

        Date:
                Novemeber 11, 2012

        Parameters:
        forecast[in] - - The result of the API call.

      • readIconBitmap

        private Bitmap readIconBitmap(java.lang.String conditionString,
                    int bitmapSampleSize)
        Written by Brian Butterfield, this method takes in an icon name and retrieves the bitmap for that name. The method was modified to add a timeout period for the API call.

        Date:
                Novemeber 11, 2012

        Parameters:
        conditionString - - Name of the icon
        bitmapSampleSize - - Value to scale the bitmap by
        Returns:
        iconBitmp - The bitmap of the icon
